author: mmusich
body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44284

#### PR description:

This PR contains updates to the trigger DQM for the modified MSSM Hbb triggers for 2024.
   * https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3024
   * https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3080

It mainly consists in updating the following:
   * trigger paths and trigger objects names
   * offline btagging for the relative efficiencies
   * moving from HIG  SUS
   
#### PR validation:

see master PR

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

verbatim backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44284
title: MSSM Hbb trigger dqm updates for 2024 triggers [14.0.X]
